Sentence.sentence: For more than two decades, starting in the 1960s, the poet Ted Hughes sat on the judging panel of an annual poetry competition for British schoolchildren.

Sentence.sentence: He also famously remarked that all of man's problems come from his inability to sit quietly in a room alone.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: While college facilities sit idle, they continue to generate maintenance expenses that contribute to the high cost of running a college," he has written.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"坐"之意。
means: seat ： 及物动词，常与反身代词连用，常用过去分词seated形式。
sit ： 多用作不及物动词，用作及物动词时，可与seat换用。

Sentence.sentence: "Staying with a native speaker is better for children than simply sitting in a classroom, " says Suzanne Flynn, a professor in language education of children.

Sentence.sentence: And while you're at it, actually sit down to eat.

Sentence.sentence: Dad said she was probably lonely, and that I ought to sit and listen and nod my head and smile, and Maybe she'd work it out of her system.

sentences.en: I'd rather stand than sit.
sentences.cn: 我宁肯站, 不愿坐。

sentences.en: He sat there (as) a guest.
sentences.cn: 他像个客人似的坐在那儿。

sentences.en: She sat silent in her own room.
sentences.cn: 她在自己的房间里一动不动地坐着。

sentences.en: He sat propped up in the bed by pillows.
sentences.cn: 他靠着枕头坐在床上。

sentences.en: He sat thinking for a long time.
sentences.cn: 他坐着想了很久。

sentences.en: She sat the baby on the grass.
sentences.cn: 她让婴儿坐在草地上。

sentences.en: She sits her horse well.
sentences.cn: 她善骑马。

means.word_mean: (动物或鸟)栖息; 蹲, 坐,孵（卵）

sentences.en: There was a bird sitting on the branch.
sentences.cn: 一只鸟栖息在树枝上。

sentences.en: The hotel sits on a hill.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆位于一座小山上。

means.word_mean: (议会、委员会、法庭等)开会；开庭

jx.jx_cn_mean: 做某人的学生（或追随者），师承（某人）

jx.jx_en_mean: (vulgar slang)do nothing; fail to take action
(of food) take a long time to be digested
drive extremely close behind another vehicle, typically while waiting for a chance to overtake
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指为等机会超车时）紧跟着开车

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)suddenly start paying attention or have one's interest aroused

lj.lj_ly: sit back and enjoy the music.

jx.jx_en_mean: take no action in order to prevent something undesirable from occurring

lj.lj_ly: I'm not going to sit by and let an innocent man go to jail.
lj.lj_ls: 我不打算袖手旁观让清白无辜的人坐牢。

jx.jx_en_mean: temporarily carry out the duties of (another person)

lj.lj_ly: she sat on the article until a deadline galvanized her into putting words to paper.
lj.lj_ls: 她拖着写那篇文章，直到截止日期临近时，才促使她落笔成文。

jx.jx_en_mean: subdue (someone), typically by saying something intended to discomfit or embarrass them
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指用说令某人不快或难堪的话来）压制（某人）

jx.jx_en_mean: not take part in a particular event or activity

lj.lj_ly: he had to sit out Sheffield Wednesday's UEFA Cup game.
lj.lj_ls: 他不得不拒绝参加星期三在设菲尔德举行的欧洲联盟杯比赛。

entry.def: If you are sitting somewhere, for example in a chair, your bottom is resting on the chair and the upper part of your body is upright.

example.ex: Mother was sitting in her chair in the kitchen...
example.tran: 妈妈坐在厨房里的椅子上。

example.ex: They sat there in shock and disbelief...
example.tran: 他们吃惊地坐在那里，不敢相信这是真的。

entry.def: When you sit somewhere, you lower your body until you are sitting on something.

example.ex: He set the cases against a wall and sat on them...
example.tran: 他把箱子靠墙放好，然后坐在上面。

example.ex: Eva pulled over a chair and sat beside her husband...
example.tran: 伊娃拽过一把椅子，坐到丈夫的身边。

entry.def: If you sit someone somewhere, you tell them to sit there or put them in a sitting position.

example.ex: He used to sit me on his lap...
example.tran: 他过去常常让我坐在他的腿上。

example.ex: He'll sit you in front of his computer and give you a glimpse of the problem.
example.tran: 他会让你坐到电脑前，大致了解一下这个问题。

entry.def: If you sit for an artist or photographer, you place yourself in a sitting position so you can be painted or photographed.

example.ex: A person may well have been sitting for the artist for eight hours at a stretch.
example.tran: 为了让画家给自己画像，一个人很有可能连续坐上 8 个钟头。

entry.def: If you sit an examination, you do it.

example.ex: June and July are the traditional months for sitting exams.
example.tran: 6 月和 7 月是传统的考试月份。

entry.def: If you sit on a committee or other official group, you are a member of it.

example.ex: He was asked to sit on numerous committees...
example.tran: 他受邀担任过许多委员会的委员。

example.ex: I know of no professional person who has ever sat on a jury...
example.tran: 据我所知，陪审团的成员中从未有过专业人员。

entry.def: When a parliament, legislature, court, or other official body sits, it officially carries out its work.

example.ex: Parliament sits for only 28 weeks out of 52...
example.tran: 在一年 52 周当中只有 28 周是议会开会的时间。

example.ex: The court would sit all night.

entry.def: If a building or object sits in a particular place, it is in that place.

example.ex: Our new house sat next to a stream...
example.tran: 我们的新房子坐落在一条小溪旁。

example.ex: On the table sat a box decorated with little pearl triangles.
example.tran: 桌上有一只用珠子串成的小三角形作装饰的盒子。

entry.def: To sit for someone means the same as to babysit for them.
entry.tran: 代人临时照看小孩;当临时保姆

example.ex: I've asked Mum to sit for us next Saturday.
example.tran: 我已经拜托妈妈下周六为我们临时照看一下孩子。

entry.def: If you sit tight, you remain in the same place or situation and do not take any action, usually because you are waiting for something to happen.
entry.tran: 呆在原处不动;不轻举妄动

example.ex: Sit tight. I'll be right back...
example.tran: 你留在这儿别动，我马上就回来。

example.ex: Life would continue to be hard but if they sat tight and trusted him things would get better.
example.tran: 生活依然会很艰辛，但是如果他们能静观其变，并且信任他，一切会慢慢好起来的。

sentences.sentence: "When does the court of law sit?"

means.word_mean: 5. assume a posture as for artistic purposes;

sentences.sentence: "We don't know the woman who posed for Leonardo so often"

means.word_mean: 6. sit and travel on the back of animal, usually while controlling its motions;

sentences.sentence: "The girl liked to drive the young mare"

means.word_mean: 7. work or act as a baby-sitter;

sentences.sentence: "I cannot baby-sit tonight; I have too much homework to do"

means.word_mean: 8. show to a seat; assign a seat for;

sentences.sentence: "The host seated me next to Mrs. Smith"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sittan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zitten, German sitzen, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin sedere and Greek hezesthai

means: Society of Industrial Technology <英>工业技术协会

sentences.cn: 我们的新房子坐落在一条小溪旁。
sentences.en: Our new house sat next to a stream.

sentences.cn: 小鸟静静的坐在鼹鼠那黑乎乎的,处在地下室的鸟笼里.
sentences.en: It was sitting very still in its cage in Mole's dark underground room.

sentences.cn: 狼也许处在离叶子很远的环节上.
sentences.en: A wolf may sit many links away from a leaf.

sentences.cn: 她在几个委员会里任职。
sentences.en: She sat on a number of committees.

sentences.cn: 我只能在委员会任职到1992年为止.
sentences.en: I'll be able to sit on the commission only until September 1992.

sentences.cn: 那个人是位法官, 现在浦耳任职.
sentences.en: The man is a Justice of the Peace , and sits on the bench at Poole.

sentences.cn: 这个党派有3名议员会继续在议会任职。
sentences.en: The party's three MPs will continue to sit in parliament.

sentences.cn: 议会一年的开会时间不足六个月。
sentences.en: Parliament sits for less than six months of the year.

sentences.cn: 开会时他往往持观望态度。
sentences.en: He tends to sit on the fence at meetings.

sentences.cn: 在一年 52 周当中只有 28 周是议会开会的时间。
sentences.en: Parliament sits for only 28 weeks out of 52...

sentences.cn: 议会开会期间, 玛格丽特的时间安排得很满.
sentences.en: While Parliament was sitting, Margaret's days were full.

sentences.cn: 如果我能完成任务,为什么还要坐在会议室里开会?
sentences.en: Why am I sitting in on another meeting when I could be getting work done?

sentences.cn: 有一阵子我们两个人在录音室开会,感到很痛苦,因为我们什麽都没干的坐在那里对看.
sentences.en: We sit there looking blankly at each other . And then we go down to the pub.

sentences.cn: 乌干达就同莱索托就六个月的进口货储备进行着开会讨论.
sentences.en: Uganda and Lesotho sit on reserves worth about six months of imports.

sentences.cn: 下议院仍在开会.
sentences.en: The House of Commons was still sitting.

sentences.cn: 两个星期后议院就要开会了.
sentences.en: In a fortnight the House witt be sitting.

sentences.cn: 经理今天病了,秘书要代他开会.
sentences.en: The manager is ill so the secretary will be sitting in for him.

sentences.cn: 我们正在开会,希望你参加.
sentences.en: We're heaving a conference and we'd like you to sit in.

sentences.cn: 下议院凌晨三时仍在开会.
sentences.en: The House of Commons was still sitting at 3 am.

sentences.cn: 国会秋天开会.
sentences.en: Parliament will sit in autumn.

sentences.cn: 下议院在凌晨3点还在开会.
sentences.en: The House of Commons was still sitting at 3 a.m.

sentences.cn: 委员会每星期四定期开会.
sentences.en: The committee sits regularly on Thursday.

sentences.cn: 开会时他们围桌而坐.
sentences.en: They sit round the table meeting.

sentences.cn: 他们同意:不公布他们开会的日期与时间.
sentences.en: They agreed that their days and hours of sitting should not be advertised.

sentences.cn: 现在开会了.
sentences.en: The sitting is open.

sentences.cn: 下议院凌晨3点还在开会.
sentences.en: The House of Commons was sitting at 3 a.m.

Sentence.sentence: I remember sitting on a bench with my aunt at a yoga studio, she said, and having a moment of clarity right then and there: Yoga is saving my life.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Ask Nima Veiseh what he was doing for any day in the past 15 years, however, and he will give you the details of the weather, what he was wearing, or even what side of the train he was sitting on his journey to work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In fact, we seemed to be out all the time! I don’t really remember working— of course, I was a student—or sitting around at home very much.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: When they had lunch in the dining room, they sat alone at the table.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So what Epictetus would say is sitting at home worrying about that would be wrong and wasteful and irrational.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So we're eating out or taking in, and we don't sit down—or we do, but we hurry.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I have visited some of the newer supposedly effective schools, where children shout slogans in order to learn self-control or must stand behind their desk when they can't sit still.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A Hills dale teacher who became principal last year, remembers sitting with other teachers watching students file out of a graduation ceremony and asking one another in astonishment, "How did that student graduate?
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If you hear that yours isn't doing well in math, or see them sitting outside the dean's office, it's like a personal failure
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To this end, we walk the dog, play golf, go fishing, sit in the garden, drink outside rather than inside the pub, have a picnic, live in the suburbs, go to the seaside, buy a weekend place in the country.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Sit under a tree, look at water, feel refreshed, ever so slightly renewed
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Anyone who has patted a dog, stroked a cat, sat under a tree with a pint of beer, given or received a bunch of flowers or chosen to walk through the park on a nice day, understands that.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In the morning, I just sit in comfort and read the papers to catch up with the news.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The closest that Herpin came to resting was to sit in a rocking chair and read a half dozen newspapers
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I couldn't bear to spend three hours sitting in a train every day.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Read at least several chapters at one sitting
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The rest he got from sitting in a rocking chair.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: So just type in the destination you want, sit back, sleep, watch your movie, whatever.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It's great because we play cards or just sit around and talk when there are no customers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It's not like just sitting down somewhere and watching the clouds roll by.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And my university classmates are arranging a trip to vi sit our old campus, and I'd love to go with them, but I can't afford both.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Anyway, if you vi sit Seattle, don't bring an umbrella.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: I have visited some of the newer supposedly "effective" schools, where children shout slogans in order to learn self-control or must stand behind their desk when they can' t sit still .
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I take a knitting project with me everywhere, especially when I have to sit still and listen.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B
